item.title: DDD Wales 2018
item.description: Last Saturday I attended Developer Developer Developer Wales with Nigel, Dai, Pete and we bumped into James Alfie. At Developer Developer Developer Wales with Nigel Craven, David Duncan, Peter Walsh and nice to see James Alfei #DDDWales So what is DDD Wales? The UK’s premier FREE Developer conference is coming to Wales! Since its inception in 2005, DDD has spread across the UK and throughout other parts of the world, as far afield as Melbourne and Perth.
